# Initialize ----

Change check date to month and year of camera check (when images were retrieved). Add check_2, check_3 etc. if \>1 check.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(Distance)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(activity)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

check_1 <- "2021-09"

spcs <- read_csv("raw_data/SPCS_detection_data.csv")
checks <- read_csv("raw_data/SPCS/camera_checks.csv")
elk_units <- read_csv("raw_data/elk_units.csv")
trigger_events <- read_csv("processed_data/SPCS_30min_Independent.csv")

conversion.factor <- convert_units("meter", NULL, "square kilometer")
```

# Data wrangling ----

```{r activity}
elk_trigger_events <- trigger_events %>%
  filter(species=="Cervus canadensis")
elk_trigger_events$rtime <- gettime(elk_trigger_events$date_time, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S")
act_result <- fitact(elk_trigger_events$rtime, sample="data", reps=100)
plot(act_result)
print(act_result@act)
camera.operation.per.day <- 24
prop.camera.time <- camera.operation.per.day / 24
avail <- list(creation=data.frame(rate = act_result@act[1]/prop.camera.time,
                                  SE   = act_result@act[2]/prop.camera.time))
```

Because our cameras were run for 24 hours a day, this result tells us that an average of 61% of animals were available to be detected at any given point throughout the day.

```{r wrangling}

# Effort calculation
deployment <- checks %>%
  arrange(check_date) %>%
  distinct(station_id, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(start_date = check_date) %>%
  select(station_id, start_date)
retrieval <- checks %>%
  filter(str_detect(check_date, check_1)) %>%
  mutate(end_date = if_else(is.na(stop_date), check_date, stop_date)) %>%
  select(station_id, end_date)
effort <- 
  inner_join(deployment, retrieval, by = "station_id")
effort <- effort %>%
  mutate(Tk = (int_length((start_date) %--% (end_date))), t = 1, angle = (42*(pi/180))) %>%
  filter(Tk != 0) %>%
  mutate(Tk = (Tk-86400)) %>%
  mutate(temp_effort = Tk/t, AOV = angle/(2*pi)) %>%
  mutate(effort = temp_effort*AOV) %>%
  select (station_id, temp_effort, AOV)
# Take NA values out of data
spcs <- spcs %>%
  filter(!is.na(snow_cover))
# Create elk-specific dataframe
elk <- spcs %>%
  filter(species == "Cervus canadensis") %>%
  arrange(station_id)
elk <- full_join(elk, effort, by = "station_id")
elk<- elk %>%
  transmute(Study.Area = "SPCS",
            Region.Label = "Default",
            Area = 390,
            Sample.Label = station_id,
            Effort = temp_effort,
            distance = (snow_cover+0.5),
            size = group_count,
            multiplier = AOV,
            sex = sex,
            behaviour = behaviour) %>%
  arrange(Sample.Label)
elk <- data.frame(elk)
elk <- elk %>%
  filter(behaviour != "Inspecting camera")

```

Truncate at 12m

```{r detection functions, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
trunc <- 12
breaks <- c(seq(0,8,1), 10, 12)

elk.uf2 <- ds(elk, transect = "point", key="unif", adjustment = "cos", nadj=2, 
             convert_units = conversion.factor, cutpoints = breaks, truncation = trunc)
elk.uf3 <- ds(elk, transect = "point", key="unif", adjustment = "cos", nadj=3, 
             convert_units = conversion.factor, cutpoints = breaks, truncation = trunc)
elk.hn0 <- ds(elk, transect = "point", key="hn", adjustment = NULL,
             convert_units = conversion.factor, cutpoints = breaks, truncation = trunc)
elk.hn1 <- ds(elk, transect = "point", key="hn", adjustment = "cos", nadj = 1,
             convert_units = conversion.factor, cutpoints = breaks, truncation = trunc)
elk.hn2 <- ds(elk, transect = "point", key="hn", adjustment = "cos", nadj=2, 
             convert_units = conversion.factor, cutpoints = breaks, truncation = trunc)
elk.hr0 <- ds(elk, transect = "point", key="hr", adjustment = NULL,
             convert_units = conversion.factor, cutpoints = breaks, truncation = trunc)
elk.hr1 <- ds(elk, transect = "point", key="hr", adjustment = "cos", nadj=1, 
             convert_units = conversion.factor, cutpoints = breaks, truncation = trunc)


```

```{r assess functions}

# stage 1: calculate QAIC per model set
ufQAIC <- QAIC(elk.uf2, elk.uf3)  # 3 adjustments
hnQAIC <- QAIC(elk.hn0, elk.hn1, elk.hn2)     # 0 adjustment
hrQAIC <- QAIC(elk.hr0, elk.hr1)  # 0 adjustment
print(ufQAIC)
print(hnQAIC)
print(hrQAIC)
```

```{r assess pt2}
uf <- elk.uf3
hn <- elk.hn0
hr <- elk.hr0

# stage 2
chats <- chi2_select(uf, hn, hr)$criteria
modnames <- unlist(lapply(list(uf, hn, hr), function(x) x$ddf$name.message))
results <- data.frame(modnames, chats)
results.sort <- results[order(results$chats),]
kable(results.sort, digits=2, row.names = FALSE,
             caption="Compare 3 best models") %>%
  kable_paper(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  row_spec(1, bold=TRUE,  background = "#4da6ff")

```

```{r uf sensibility check}

w <- range(breaks)[2] - range(breaks)[1]
uf_rho <- sqrt(uf_p_a * w^2)
```

```{r get UF estimates}

uf.sum.n <- summary(uf)$dht$individuals$N
uf.sum.d <- summary(uf)$dht$individuals$D
kable(uf.sum.n, digits=2, row.names = FALSE,
             caption="Uniform Model Results") %>%
  kable_paper(full_width = FALSE)
uf.dht2.n <- dht2(uf, flatfile=elk, strat_formula = ~1,er_est = "P2", 
                 convert_units = conversion.factor)
print(uf.dht2.n, report="abundance")
```

# Bootstrapping ----

```{r summary function}
mysummary <- function(ests, fit){
  return(data.frame(Label = ests$individuals$N$Label,
                    Nhat = ests$individuals$N$Estimate))
}
```

```{r multiplier function}
mult <- list(availability= make_activity_fn(elk_trigger_events$rtime, sample="data",
                                          detector_daily_duration=camera.operation.per.day))
```

```{r bootstrap, eval=FALSE}
boot.uf <- bootdht(model=elk.uf3, flatfile=elk, nboot=100, summary_fun = mysummary,
                          convert_units = conversion.factor)

print(summary(boot.uf))
```
